hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“If anyone of you goes to bed with a smell emanating from his hand, and he does not wash his hand, and something happens to him, he should not blame anyone but himself.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاتَ وَفِي يَدِهِ رِيحُ غَمَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: One who goes to bed with smell emanating from his hand
